text: The Minister of Regional Affairs and Autonomies (Italian: Ministro per Affari Regionali e le Autonomie) is one of the positions in the Italian government. The current Minister of Regional Affairs and Autonomies is Francesco Boccia, of the Democratic Party, who held the office since 5 September 2019 in the cabinet of Giuseppe Conte.Francesco Boccia è il ministro agli Affari regionali.
